review: So far I am pleased with the Fire Stick. It has all the apps we need for streaming shows and movies. Although I feel it tends to buffer more than other streaming devices I've used but this may just be a WiFi issue. Overall it was a good purchase.
author: Toni

review: Wicked awesome just replace my chromecast with the fire stick it is so much easier for my wife to operate and with me being a walking commercial for amazon all of my prime benefits makes it that much better. Wish it was available before I bought the chromecast. I would definitely recommend.
author: Gym Shu

review: I cannot even rate the actual value of this item even though I have had two sent to me. The first apparently had an identical serial number as someone else's product and therefore could not be registered. It had to be returned. The reconditioned replacement would not even turn on because it had old software. It had to be returned too. I have spent two hours 'using' these two items and was never even able to get to the home screen. Incredibly frustrating. Would give 0 stars if possible.
author: Ann

review: Works great. I love having Amazon Streaming video and Netflix stream right to the TV. Also, I keep finding out about new apps to download that allow me to watch some shows from cable channels. I ditched cable years ago and I love device like this that allow me to watch what I want whenever I want.
